TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection Inherits CollectionBase
public ref class SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection sealed : System::Collections::CollectionBase

summary.span: 继承自 的 对象的集合。

span.span: Collection of objects that inherits from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列映射定义数据源和目标表之间的映射。Column mappings define the mapping between data source and the target table. 如果未定义映射 (即, 集合为空), 则根据序号位置隐式映射列。If mappings are not defined - that is, the collection is empty - the columns are mapped implicitly based on ordinal position. 为此, 源架构和目标架构必须匹配。For this to work, source and target schemas must match. 如果不是, 则会引发。If they do not, an is thrown. 如果集合不为空, 则必须指定数据源中存在的每一列。If the collection is not empty, not every column present in the data source has to be specified. 被忽略的不是由集合映射的。Those not mapped by the collection are ignored. 可以按名称或序号引用源列和目标列。You can refer to source and target columns by either name or ordinal. 可以在同一个映射集合中混合按名称和按顺序的列引用。You can mix by-name and by-ordinal column references in the same mappings collection. ## Examples 下面的示例将数据从**AdventureWorks**示例数据库中的源表大容量复制到同一个数据库中的目标表。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与源中的列数匹配, 但列名称和序号位置不匹配。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 添加到对象的 , 以创建大容量复制的列映射。 are added to the for the object to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表, 否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中, 则使用 transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将新 添加到 中。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将数据从**AdventureWorks**示例数据库中的源表大容量复制到同一个数据库中的目标表。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与源中的列数匹配, 但列名称和序号位置不匹配。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于为大容量复制创建列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表, 否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中, 则使用 transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Creates a new and adds it to the collection, using ordinals to specify both source and destination columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的映射必须是统一的: 所有整数/整数对、所有字符串/字符串对、所有整数/字符串对或所有字符串/整数对。Mappings in a collection must be uniform: either all integer/integer pairs, all string/string pairs, all integer/string pairs, or all string/integer pairs. 如果尝试添加的映射与集合中已有的其他映射不同, 则会引发。If you try to add a mapping that is different from others already in the collection, an is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例将数据从**AdventureWorks**示例数据库中的源表大容量复制到同一个数据库中的目标表。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与源中的列数匹配, 但列名称和序号位置不匹配。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于为使用源列和目标列的序号位置的大容量复制创建列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy using the ordinal position of the source and destination columns. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表, 否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中, 则使用 transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollectionOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollectionOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollectionOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollectionOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的映射必须是统一的: 所有整数/整数对、所有字符串/字符串对、所有整数/字符串对或所有字符串/整数对。Mappings in a collection must be uniform: either all integer/integer pairs, all string/string pairs, all integer/string pairs, or all string/integer pairs. 如果尝试添加的映射与集合中已有的其他映射不同, 则会引发。If you try to add a mapping that is different from others already in the collection, an is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例将数据从**AdventureWorks**示例数据库中的源表大容量复制到同一个数据库中的目标表。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与源中的列数匹配, 但列名称和序号位置不匹配。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 该代码通过指定列名称来创建对象。The code creates a object by specifying the column names. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表, 否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中, 则使用 transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

span.span: Clears the contents of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 单个实例处理多个大容量复制操作时, 最常用的方法是使用方法。The method is most commonly used when you use a single instance to process more than one bulk copy operation. 如果为一个大容量复制操作创建列映射, 则必须清除该 方法后面的, 然后再处理下一个大容量复制。If you create column mappings for one bulk copy operation, you must clear the after the method and before processing the next bulk copy. 使用同一个实例执行多个大容量复制通常比使用单独用于每个操作的性能点更有效。Performing several bulk copies using the same instance will usually be more efficient from a performance point of view than using a separate for each operation. ## Examples 下面的示例执行两个大容量复制操作。The following example performs two bulk copy operations. 第一个操作复制销售订单表头信息, 第二个操作复制销售订单详细信息。The first operation copies sales order header information, and the second copies sales order details. 虽然在此示例中不是绝对必要的 (因为源列和目标列的序号位置匹配), 该示例为每个大容量复制操作定义了列映射。Although not strictly necessary in this example (because the ordinal positions of the source and destination columns do match), the example defines column mappings for each bulk copy operation. 在执行第一个大容量复制并定义下一个大容量复制的列映射之前, 必须使用方法。The method must be used after the first bulk copy is performed and before the next bulk copy's column mappings are defined. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表, 否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中, 则使用 transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdersDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdersDetails/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdersDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdersDetails/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 单个实例处理多个大容量复制操作时, 最常用的方法是使用方法。The method is most commonly used when you use a single instance to process more than one bulk copy operation. 如果为一个大容量复制操作创建列映射, 则必须在调用方法之后以及在为下一个大容量复制定义映射之前, 删除不再适用的映射。If you create column mappings for one bulk copy operation, you must remove mappings that no longer apply after the method is called and before defining mapping for the next bulk copy. 您可以使用方法清除整个集合, 或者使用方法或方法单独移除映射。You can clear the entire collection by using the method, or remove mappings individually using the method or the method. 使用同一个实例执行多个大容量复制通常比使用单独用于每个操作的性能点更有效。Performing several bulk copies using the same instance will usually be more efficient from a performance point of view than using a separate for each operation. ## Examples 下面的示例执行两个大容量复制操作。The following example performs two bulk copy operations. 第一个操作复制销售订单表头信息, 第二个操作复制销售订单详细信息。The first operation copies sales order header information, and the second copies sales order details. 虽然在此示例中不是绝对必要的 (因为源列和目标列的序号位置匹配), 该示例为每个大容量复制操作定义了列映射。Although not strictly necessary in this example (because the ordinal positions of the source and destination columns do match), the example defines column mappings for each bulk copy operation. 这两个大容量复制都包含**SalesOrderID**的映射, 因此, 此示例将删除所有映射, 而不是在大容量复制操作之间清除整个集合,对于第二个大容量复制操作。Both bulk copies include a mapping for the **SalesOrderID**, so rather than clearing the entire collection between bulk copy operations, the example removes all mappings except for the **SalesOrderID** mapping and then adds the appropriate mappings for the second bulk copy operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表, 否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中, 则使用 transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemove/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemove/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed

param.name: index
param.span: 要从集合中移除的 对象的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the object to be removed from the collection.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定索引处的映射。

span.span: Removes the mapping at the specified index from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 单个实例处理多个大容量复制操作时, 最常用的方法是使用方法。The method is most commonly used when you use a single instance to process more than one bulk copy operation. 如果为一个大容量复制操作创建列映射, 则必须在调用方法之后以及在为下一个大容量复制定义映射之前, 删除不再适用的映射。If you create column mappings for one bulk copy operation, you must remove mappings that no longer apply after the method is called and before defining mapping for the next bulk copy. 您可以使用方法清除整个集合, 或者使用方法或方法单独移除映射。You can clear the entire collection by using the method, or remove mappings individually using the method or the method. 使用同一个实例执行多个大容量复制通常比使用单独用于每个操作的性能点更有效。Performing several bulk copies using the same instance will usually be more efficient from a performance point of view than using a separate for each operation. ## [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemoveAt/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemoveAt/VB/source.vb#1)]
